hero.title:
Functional design
for your kitchen
hero.description: Smart accessories for Thermomix 3D printed. Organize your utensils, optimize your space and customize every detail with your favorite color.

customizableColors.title: Customizable Colors
customizableColors.desc: Wide color range available. Yellow, black, white and more. Choose the one that matches your kitchen.

premiumMaterials.title: Premium Materials
premiumMaterials.desc: Made exclusively with high-quality PETG and ABS for long durability and easy cleaning.

customDesign.title: Custom Design
customDesign.desc: Do you have a special idea? We transform your concept into a real and personalized tool.

products.title: Product Catalog
products.subtitle: Smart solutions to organize and optimize your Thermomix
products.cookieCuttersDesc: Over 50 custom cookie cutter designs. Animals, shapes, holidays and more.

1.title: Choose product
1.desc: Select the accessory you need from our catalog

2.title: Customize
2.desc: Choose the color (yellow, black, white, etc.)

3.title: Contact us
3.desc: Write us via WhatsApp or Instagram

4.title: Receive
4.desc: We ship it or arrange pickup

customization.title: Do you have an idea?
customization.description: We are 3D design specialists. We transform your concept into a real, functional and fully customized tool for your specific needs.
features: Custom design from scratch according to your specifications
Choice of corporate or preferred colors
Rapid prototyping and adjustments at no additional cost

materials.title: High Quality Materials
materials.subtitle: Durability and safety guaranteed in every print

petg.title: Premium PETG
petg.desc: Ideal for food use and kitchen contact. Impact resistant, easy to clean and durable.

abs.title: High Strength ABS
abs.desc: Maximum durability for supports and structures. Professional finish and superior rigidity.
features: Smooth finish to the touch (vapor smoothing)

contact.title: Ready for your order?
contact.description: Contact us directly via WhatsApp for personalized and fast service.

footer.description: Smart accessories for Thermomix 3D printed. Organize your kitchen with style.

cookieCutters.title: 3D Cookie Cutters
cookieCutters.subtitle: 3D printed cookie cutters made with food-safe materials. Exclusive designs for every occasion.

bulkOrder.title: Need quantity?
bulkOrder.desc: We offer special discounts for bulk orders. Ideal for bakeries, events or corporate gifts.
